headline: Skillet Chicken Bulgogi
name: Skillet Chicken Bulgogi
description: An easy recipe for chicken bulgogi that comes together in 30 minutes. Get dinner on the table quickly with this Korean skillet dish everyone loves.
recipeIngredient: salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 pound skinless, boneless chicken breasts, cut into thin strips

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk onion, soy sauce, brown sugar, garlic, sesame oil, sesame seeds, cayenne pepper, salt, and black pepper together in a bowl until marinade is smooth.
Cook and stir chicken and marinade together in a large skillet over medium-high heat until chicken is cooked through, about 15 minutes.
